title: my league just turns in to the old version without hextech and shop randomly
body: I dont know what is happening please help it sometimes turns back but im not sure wat happens

replies.body:
Hey there,

That's no good, could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps out.
